title: Nepomuk
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A mostly vegetarian restaurant and managed in a self-government way according to the cart centre "franz.K." Offers a large variety of meals, including house-made maultaschen, omelette, crepes, swabian seele (like ciabatta), and few vegan items like gyro, curry, and faux sausage. Sources regional, fair trade, and/or organic.
